verses.name: Mark 8:19
verses.text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? They say unto him, Twelve.

verses.name: Mark 8:20
verses.text: And when the seven among four thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? And they said, Seven.

verses.name: Mark 8:21
verses.text: And he said unto them, How is it that ye do not understand?

verses.name: Mark 8:22
verses.text: And he cometh to Bethsaida; and they bring a blind man unto him, and besought him to touch him.
